channel.title: Crash Dying While Scoped
channel.description:
I had just fired a shot with the crossbow, so I think it was beginning the animation of coming out of the scope, and I died. Immediate CTD. I'm not sure if it matters but I was on the cliffside area of Surface Tension.
Dump file: [url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B5OB2kbaznlKeko5eHBEU25ZelU[/url]
Windows 7 SP1 64-bit GTX570 i5-2400 3.1Ghz
